actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to relieve taxpayers from liability with respect to certain underpayments of estimated tax, underwithholding, and interest on underpayment of tax attributable to the application to 1976 of the sick pay and other provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1976.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that taxpayers shall not be required to pay the principal or interest for underpayments of taxes for any period prior to April 16, 1977 (March 16, 1977 in the case of a corporation), nor penalized for any failure to withhold and deduct taxes on remuneration paid before 1977, to the extent that such failures or underpayment are attributable to new or increased tax liabilities imposed by the Tax Reform Act.

titles.title: A bill to relieve taxpayers from liability with respect to certain underpayments of estimated tax, underwithholding, and interest on underpayment of tax attributable to the application to 1976 of the sick pay and other provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1976.
